issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: HIVE-18061 caused some issues in yetus check by introducing q.out_spark files.
fields.summary: q.outs: fix issues caused by q.out_spark files

comments.body: Hi [~pvary] !  Could you take a look at this?

ATTACHMENT ID: 12908014 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

+1

(next time please take care of the indentation too :) - it is serious nitpicking, but anyway :) )

pushed to master. Thank you [~abstractdog] for taking care of this and @pete for reviewing the changes!
(I've adjusted the indentation to match the lines around that part; and currently there are 1 tab + 3 spaces ....which is pretty exotic to me :D

:) :) :)

Thanks [~kgyrtkirk] for commiting, and [~abstractdog] for taking care of this!
This jira is resolved and released with Hive 3.0 If you find an issue with it, please create a new jira.
